creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: blocky black and white image divided in sections; figure holding staff overhead R of C; text and metal vessels to his L; foundry workers opening molds at bottom; large cast bell at LL; figure walking down dark alley at top, with another figure in a darkened building UR
inscription:
at top, from right: 裏小路　渡り屋根
in center: 一越中高岡鋳物の名所　ヤガエフ　火鉢鍋釜　手取釜
at bottom, from right: 外型　中子　型組　耳型
portfolio: From Ironmonger's Marching Song (Yagaefu やがえ節)
title: Fourth song (part 6)
